description: 多输入特征图在指定维度拼接
interfaces: virtual int ncnn::Concat::forward(const std::vector<ncnn::Mat> &bottom_blobs, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::Swish::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::Sigmoid::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;

description: 逐元素加/乘/最大等融合
interfaces: virtual int ncnn::Eltwise::forward(const std::vector<ncnn::Mat> &bottom_blobs, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::InnerProduct::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::ReLU::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;

description: 训练期按比例置零，推理期缩放
interfaces: virtual int ncnn::Dropout::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;

description: 通道归一化 (scale, bias, mean, var)
interfaces: virtual int ncnn::BatchNorm::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::TanH::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::Convolution1D::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::Softmax::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::Pooling::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;

description: 每通道独立卷积再可选点卷积
interfaces: virtual int ncnn::DepthwiseConvolution::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;

description: 长短期记忆单元(序列建模)
interfaces: virtual int ncnn::LSTM::forward(const std::vector<ncnn::Mat> &bottom_blobs, std::vector<ncnn::Mat> &top_blobs, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
virtual int ncnn::GELU::forward(const ncnn::Mat &bottom_blob, ncnn::Mat &top_blob, const ncnn::Option &opt) const;
